sample.controller

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • sample.controller.Controller

  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    This controller class will controls the main user interface. This class loads the mapeditor window, newmap window and game window. This class checks the map validation and if the map is valid then it will load the game window. Otherwise it show the error.
    Author:
    Team43.
